divs: Sighting DetailsSee above, see this sort of thing often, not usually as bright and does not shape shift with colors usually. Noticed due to extreme brightness compared to other celestial body's. definitely in our atmosphere. I knew it was a UFO. Seen numerous varied ones over the years, have numerous witnesses to many other events, spanning the last 15 to 20 years. As for my feelings I always ask if tonight is the night. Contact is inevitable. If was a very clear and cold night I came inside and watched it through the window.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in South Whitley
There were no other sightings in South Whitley on or around March 14th 2013
Summary: Outside to smoke noticed bright cross shaped object that transformed into diamond shape made erratic ellipses with stops as shape changed
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
